mapper.insert: insert into parking_fee (park_id, fee, pay_type, charge_rule, is_del, create_time, update_time) values (#{parkId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{chargeRule,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update parking_fee set park_id = #{parkId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fee = #{fee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, charge_rule = #{chargeRule,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, park_id, fee, pay_type, charge_rule, is_del, create_time, update_time from parking_fee order by id desc
